item.title: Creating blog in hugo
item.description: I’ve been meaning to create a personal blog for a long time. I did some research and decided to go with hugo. There’s one main reason for using hugo over anything else: amazing speed org-mode support out-of-the box üòÉ emojis? As a matter of fact this post is written fully in org. I started with the quickstart guide. There’s a really great minimalistic theme cocoa-eh. After messing with a config.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi ! My name is Timur, and this is my blog. I am based in Toronto. If you are passing by don’t hesitate to say hi. I like bikes, gym and beer(in moderation)

item.title: Home
item.description: Young professional a.k.a code monkey struggling with fitness clothes addiction. Some befunge for nerds üòè: "!emocleW'">:#,_@ Please checkout my projects

item.title: Kernel module monitoring syscalls
item.description: So in one the OS classes we had to write a kernel module that intercepts system calls of choice. For that matter we were introduced to the concept of system call table. There is a good description here. We start with a snippet taken from tldp. #include <linux/kernel.h> /* Needed for KERN_INFO */ #include <linux/init.h> /* Needed for the macros */ extern void* sys_call_table[]; /* Apparently kernel doesn't export the address starting 2.
